blog.name: virge-of-death
blog.title: "Fight me, Helen"
blog.description:
Hello! My name is Evan and I like animals. I am Pansexual, Demiboy, Polygamous, and I am currently single!! I love making friends, so hop on into my ask box! Send me random memes if ya want, im always up for memes. Adding on to this now, I do not roleplay much on here, but I do have a roleplay server I am quite active on, more than tumblr, on discord. A lot of roles are taken, but we still have quiet a few Ipliers left, and we are soon adding Crankgameplays and Natewantstobattle egos as well! Just send and ask and I'll give ya a link. 
Icon by bingiplierdaily

summary: THE WAR IS COMING. Romera used to be a land of peace, ruled under one beloved King. However, his children have now split the...
caption:
THE WAR IS COMING.

Romera used to be a land of peace, ruled under one beloved King. However, his children have now split the continent and are wreaking harok as they fight amongst themselves. King Rolland II of Hegaehend has always worked as an intermediary for his siblings, attempting to bring peace to his family and the people of Romera, and it matters now more than ever. War is breaking down your way of life, forcing you to step up and take action, and King Rolland has asked anyone of capable skill to protect the commoners, to push back his siblings invading armies from the largest of the populations. Whether you’ve sworn to a deity to protect the people or whether you’re just looking for a good fight there is now a job out there for you. Healer, thieves, knights and spellcasters are all coming together for whatever goal they may have for themselves or the nation, anything to protect what they believe in.

WHAT ARE YOU FIGHTING FOR?

ROMERA-RP is an original medieval fantasy roleplay inspired by Dungeons and Dragons. Using the material and lore, such as races, classes, and deities of 5th Edition, as well as a small mix of homebrew, Pathfinder and 4th Edition. This is an original character bio roleplay catering to players who are 18+. We are hoping to attract dedicated writers who will emmerse themselves in the world of the roleplay, and contribute to character and worldbuilding.

[ CHECK OUT THE FULL ROLEPLAY ]

blog.name: watchtheantagonist
blog.title: Untitled The First
blog.description: she/her. Basically just whatever I'm obsessing about at a given moment. Currently mostly, Critical Role, TAZ, the Penumbra Podcast, and Brandon Sanderson books.

body:
Au: Orphanmakers

Okay, so au where the throwaway gag of them becoming a band actually happens:

  • Yasha is the star rock harpist. I like the idea that shes one of the ones that actually has some talent. I’m imagining recruiters trying to scout her, but shes just here to have fun with her friends so she basically just responds how she did when the army recruiter gave her his pitch
  • Jester plays piano and also sings. She also gets them most of their gigs, as Marian lets her play at the Chateau. I know that, logically, she should play a keyboard or something but I have an image in my head of the group lugging around a grand piano so that’s what we’re doing. When asked about this, Yasha just responds with a deadpan “I am very strong” while Jester flexes in the background
  • Nott ‘plays’ a bunch of buttons tied together. She also provides ear piercing death metal screams. Yeza is very proud and going around bragging to everyone who will listen about how his wife is in a rock band. The two of them sing Luc (heavily modified) versions of the songs
  • Caleb doesn’t really like going on stage, though he has been known to provide backup singing after having a couple drinks. He is the group’s manager, and is VERY good at that job. Every gig they get not provided by Jesters mom is because of him. All in all, he enjoys it a lot, though wearing a shirt with the word Orphanmaker on the front maybe isnt his favorite part
  • Beau plays drums. Is she a good drummer? Eh… Is she a loud drummer? Absolutely. Is she pretending to love all of the attention the band gets her all the while pining after the lead harpist? Perhaps.
  • Fjord can sort of play an instrument. That is, he learns how to play a couple of chords and puts his absurdly high charisma and deception to use faking it for all he’s worth. All in all, that’s more than some of the others can do so it works
  • Cad… Tries. He tends to get distracted, though, and he doesn’t seem super into being on stage. Mostly he just watches with Caleb while drinking tea and telling everyone they’re doing a really good job. I like the image of him in the front row of this concert holding a tea cup.
  • Jester designs posters for their group. The design features a portrait of Molly. Nude, of course. This tends to cause some upset that leads to many being removed, but she just puts up more.
  • Many of the groups songs are about living life to the fullest. These are dedicated to Molly. Many of their songs are about sex. These are also dedicated to Molly

blog.description: I'm Charlie! I'm attempting to tag "cr spoilers" until the subsequent Tuesday, but don't expect perfection. I'm into a lot of things — right now it's mostly Critical Role, but Utena still owns my heart. 22, butch lesbian, she/her. Link to asks!

summary: 'Memorial' by Susanne Sundfor is such an angsty end-of-the-campaign Vaxleth feels?? 'Cosmic war raging in the sky/but all I...
question: 'Memorial' by Susanne Sundfor is such an angsty end-of-the-campaign Vaxleth feels?? 'Cosmic war raging in the sky/but all I could hear was your last goodbye'
answer:
Oh god you’re not wrong about the angst…

“You won’t come back again/ 
Even if the world should end/ 
Still I will never let/ 
Anybody else come in” 

I can imagine this is what Keyleth felt, like she could never possibly love again after Vax.

Come yell at me about songs that remind you of Critical Role! (Playlist | song spreadsheet & masterlist by disasterhumans | CR music tag)

de rolo's grow up with affection now
summary: Happy fathers day to Scanlan Shorthalt, who is a shit dad but is definitely doing his best to be better at it with help from his...
body:
Happy fathers day to Scanlan Shorthalt, who is a shit dad but is definitely doing his best to be better at it with help from his little family and Kaylie. 

And happy fathers day to Percy too, who I hope is enjoying his life now that he’s back to noble life instead of constant death all the time.

hope it worked for you too
summary: Happy Father’s Day to Percival de Rolo. Now don’t let the little hellions steal their mother’s broom and concoct a plan to go on...
body:
Happy Father’s Day to Percival de Rolo. Now don’t let the little hellions steal their mother’s broom and concoct a plan to go on a joy ride off the clock tower scaffolding. Again.

(Trinket dragged the twins back last time, grumbling all the way.)

(Auntie Velora was very cross but secretly wanted to try it, too.)

(Vex grounded them for a week but _also_ secretly wanted to try it.)

(Percy just got back to trying to build a better mousetrap to keep all the fun gadgets safely locked away, and reminded himself that with him and Vex as parents, he REALLY should have seen this nonsense coming.)
